“oba wenath dewiwarunta sewaya nokala yuthuyi.+ owun idiriye wanda wati owunta namaskara karannawath pudapuja oppu karannawath epa.+ 36 mama mage mahath balaya widahapenwa eejipthu deshayen obawa nidahas kalemi.+ ebawin oba namaskara kala yuththe yehowa dewi wana mata pamani.+ oba wanda watiya yuththe ma idiriye pamani.+ puja oppu kala yuththeda mata pamani.+ 37 ma obata liya dun+ mage niyoga+ ha thinduda+ mage aagnya ha nithida samada pilipadinna.+ kisiwitekath wenath dewiwarunta namaskara nokaranna. 38 ma oba samanga athi karagath giwisuma amathaka nokaranna.+ wenath dewiwarunta namaskara nokaranna.+ 39 oba namaskara kala yuththe obe dewi wana yehowata pamanayi.+ manda obe siyalu sathuran athin obawa galawaganne mamaya.”+ 40 namuth owuhu dewita kikaru nowi kalin adahu aagamwala wathpiliwethwalata anuwa jiwath wuha.+ 41 ema jathinta yehowa dewi kerehi biyak thibunada+ owun namaskara kale thaman sadagath dewatha rupawalataya.

diyawadiyawe balapama nisa athiwiya haki anshabhagaya, akshikachaye durwalatha, padawala athiwana thuwala nisa athiwana gatalu, snayu durwalathawaya, lingika belahinathwaya charma roga wani rogabadha sandaha da rasa waidya ka්ramaya thula aushadhiya pa්rathikara adanguyi.diyawadiyawata goduru wu rogin, rathu kakulu sahal bath ho nadu sahal bath aaharayata gannawata wada hinati sahal wani sha්ri lankawe parani wi wargawalin sakasu sahalwalin pisagath bath aaharayata ganne nam, itha sudusuyi.

awathar usas pela liyanna tiyusan giye kurunagala.ehedi awatharta hambawenawa apuru sar kenek.karanne maths.awuruddak hari shilpa labapu hinda ethumage nama methana danne na.habayi podi ingiyak denawa ku‘gala tiyusan giya ayata danaganna.upathinma koheda kata tikak honda na.aththa nama wenuwata kabba lena kiyala kiyannath puluwan.(eeka manthuma dipu namak ehema neme aa ethumamayi kiyanne).ku‘gala panthi karanne wayi em biye.nuwara karanne sudarshiye.thawa kiyanawanam kirthi sarge langama yaluwa .oyita wadiya nam ahanna epa ku‘gala gihillath thawama tiyub layit nam sar gana hithana eka atharala ithuru tika kiyawana ekayi aththe.oya kiyana sarge kata tikak neme godak honda na.

wathman janadhipathiwaraya jawipe- demala sandhana chanda walin path karagath ayek bawada api amathaka nokala yuthuya. 1971 sitama jawipe aramuna wi aththe rate palanaya sampurnayenma wyakula kota thamanta balaya laba ganimata haki thathwayak athi kara ganimayi. 1971 di aluth aanduwak balayata pathwi masa 9k athulatha aayudha sannaddha karallakin ema aanduwa balayen paha kirimata uthsaha kirima thulin owuntharuna jiwitha 10,000k billata dunneya. 1987 – 89 samayedi, ada pawathina palath sabha kramaya handunwadimata erehiwa nawatha wathawak sannaddha aragalayak diyath kara tharuna jiwitha 60,000kata adhika pramanayak billata dun jawipe ada yahapalana aanduwa gena eemata sarasena rata fedaral eekaka nawayakata kadana nawa wyawastha yojanawaliyata kisidu wirodhayak dakwanne natha.
namuth ada das panapita thawakek maradamuwath minissu andhayin se hindinnata pelambai sitithi.
